title: Electives experience for Digital System Design or Formal and functional verification of digital designs
content:
Guys for anyone who took either digital system design or  Formal and functional verification of digital designs how was your experience, how difficult is it to score and how interactive it is?

pls ans

comments.body: The ISA And ESA questions came from qb, so it was easy. it has verilog
You guys have a qb for isa's as well?
hey yes, for all units basically.
